description:
“Buncee Bits is the modern way to create a digital card for your loved ones, or even just a snapshot of events.” iPhone App Review

“Apple should create an extra star for this app! Graphics are amazing and functionality is flawless … I create and send buncee bits in less than 30 seconds … You can be witty, smart, funny … I love it!” Bits User

Thank you to all of our users for supporting Bits and for sending us your suggestions.

We at buncee are always tweaking our product to bring you the best app experience!

buncee bits: a quick and fun app for all social communication!

bits is a multimedia app platform for creating and sharing your personal messages and social network posts in a unique way. 

Rather than just typing a "Happy Birthday" on someone's wall, you can create a quick buncee bit that really shows you care. Add text and graphics to a bits background if you like, and then share it directly to your favorite social network. 

bits are created to perfectly fit Facebook timelines, so your unique creation will enhance your wall and your friends' walls when you share them. Bits can also be shared via twitter, tumblr, email or text message.  You can also post your bits on buncee.com to share creative inspiration with the buncee community!

Use buncee bits for: 
~ birthday messages, thank you's and cool instant notes for holidays, occasions and celebrations
~ sharing memorable moments with family and friends
~ creating cool social media visuals
~ being creative on the go
~ anytime you want to say just a little bit more :)

If you like buncee bits, then check out buncee.com where you can create cool multimedia greetings, scrapbooks, presentations, lesson plans and so much more!

Features

~ Universal app that runs on iPhone, iPad and iPod touch

~ Hundreds of high resolution backgrounds to choose from

~ Open images directly from your camera roll or by using your camera

~ Save final "BITS" images to your photo album, share them via Facebook, Twitter, Tumblr, MMS or e-mail.

~ Supports multiple font styles


buncee bits: More than just words!
releaseNotes:
Delete your bit after publishing to buncee.com from within the app
Delete comments you post from inside the app
Remove a background after its been added
Can no longer upload a blank bit
Give your bit a title during creation
UI Changes
Fixed various bugs
